title: "TRADED" T206 PSA HOFer, 1952 Bowman PSA-5 Mantle Avail

posts.post_title: "TRADED" T206 PSA HOFer, 1952 Bowman PSA-5 Mantle Avail
posts.post_content:
TRADED 

Looking to trade for a Nice-for-Grade & Centered PSA T206 HOFer (Cobb, Young, Mathewson & Johnson preferred).

Offering a Nice-for Grade & Centered 1952 Bowman Mantle, PSA-5.

Please reply to [url]arkansas2014@gmail.com[/url]

Steve
